releases.title: TypeScript, Time series models, CORS with auth

features.title: FileHandler supports TypeScript
features.description: FileHandler compiles any `.ts` file into JavaScript on the fly.

features.title: Gramex makes cross-origin requesys easy
features.description: Just add `cors: true` to the URL's `kwargs` to enable CORS.

releases.title: API keys, secure MongoDB access, session cookies

features.title: API keys support
features.description: API keys let users access services as if they were logged-in users.

features.title: Secure MongoDB access
features.description: It's now possible to connect securely to a MongoDB instance using TLS/SSL.

features.title: Session cookies
features.description: Gramex allows setting session cookies (that expire when the browser is closed, normally)

releases.title: Python 3.9 support, Faster scheduler, Tutorial videos

features.title: MongoDB write-back
features.description: FormHandler can write back to MongoDB databases.

releases.title: UIFactory events, InfluxDB support, Comicgen icons

features.title: Add and welcome users
features.description: Admin app lets administrators add new users, set their passwords, and send a welcome email.

features.title: Automated user roles
features.description: Admin app lets administrators add custom fields and roles to any user based on rules.

features.title: UIFactory inline scripts
features.description: UIFactory supports inline scripts, compresses components, and improves security.

releases.title: UIFactory events, InfluxDB support, Comicgen icons

features.title: UIFactory
features.description: UIFactory is now out of beta. Version 1.20 is packaged in Gramex 1.73, and features a simpler way to add events and create blocks.

features.title: Comicgen icons
features.description: Comicgen supports two new icon libraries that can be used as props. Microsoft’s FXEmoji with over 1,000 icons. Google’s Noto Emoji with over 2,000 icons.

features.title: FormHandler InfluxDB support
features.description: FormHandler can read from and write into InfluxDB, a time series database.
